main event: Many observers reported a strange, yellow object of intelligence-controlled flight. The pilot was able to get a close-up view of the object, which started off as a ball, turned dark, and then disappeared.
interesting points: The object moved at variable courses and was able to linger, float, and move slightly during the sighting.

The object was described as a bright, white ball of light about the size of a basketball that moved rapidly across the sky from east to west, then made a 90 degree turn and headed north, disappearing from sight.
The object was estimated to be moving at a speed in excess of 3,000 mph.
The sighting occurred in daylight at around 7:30 pm with calm skies and a full moon.
Multiple witnesses from various communities in Suffolk County, New York reported the sighting.
sighted object: a strange, yellow object of intelligence-controlled flight
